QuestData.Title: Out With The Inquisitors
QuestData.Description: Of all of the demons at the Legion's disposal, the inquisitors are some of the most terrible.$b$bEven feared by some of the lesser demons, these monsters delight in cruelty and torturing their captives.$b$bInquisitors revel in the terror they cause, but perhaps we can make that work to our advantage.$b$bFind the most powerful inquisitors you can and defeat them. Their deaths will not only improve the morale of our troops, but also send a message to their lesser forces.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Rare Elite inquisitors on Argus.
